ComicInfo.Title: Leatherhead Part 3
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev110 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-27 12:54:22. [Issue ID 529505]
ComicInfo.Summary:
“Leatherhead” Part 3! A violent skirmish between different factions breaks out in the Technodrome! The Turtles will have to make a difficult decision if they are to save the Utroms race.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|--------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Mateus Santolouco | 1 | | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Paolo Villainelli | 2 | | Sub | Subscription Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | 3 | | RE | Eastman Fun Club Edition Variant Cover | Alex Kotkin (a) & Ula Mos (c) | 4 | | RE | Anastasia's Collectibles Exclusive Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman | 5 |
